conference: International Parallel and Distributed Processing Symposium
notes: The traditional rebuttal process was replaced by specific questions and answers. Papers came from 44 different countries. The program web page lists 117 papers, but one of them ('Application Level Reordering of Remote Direct Memory Access Operations') is actually repeated, so only 116 really exist.
pc_chairs: George Biros (UTA, University of Texas, Austin, USA)
